contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} __NOTOC__ {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Heavenly Handel | Type = compilation | Artist = Various artists | Cover = Haendel.jpg | Released = 2004 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Classical music|Classical]] | Length = | Label = | Producer = | Reviews = | Last album = | This album = | Next album = }} '''''Heavenly Handel: Arias and Duets''''' is the title of a [[music]] [[Sound recording|recording]] Virgin Classics released on two [[compact disc]]s in early 2004. It is a [[performance]] of [[aria]]s and [[duet]]s from [[opera]]s by [[George Frideric Handel|Georg Friedrich Händel]]. The Virgin Classics catalog number for "Heavenly Handel" is 5624002. == Track listing == The following list shows the tracks of this recording. === First compact disc === # {{lang|it|Serse: Ombra mai fù}} # {{lang|it|Rodelinda: Dove sei, amato bene}} # {{lang|it|Armida abbandonata: In tanti affanni miei}} # {{lang|it|Aci, Galatea e Polifemo: Fra l'ombre e gl'orrori}} # {{lang|it|Aci, Galatea e Polifemo: Sorge il dì}} # {{lang|it|Admeto: La tigre arde di sdegno}} # {{lang|it|Admeto: E per monti, e per piani, e per selve}} # Hercules: Where shall I fly # {{lang|it|Splenda l'alba in oriente}} # Giulio Cesare: How silently, how slyly # Giulio Cesare: Upstart, barbarian and traitor # Giulio Cesare: Flow my tears # {{lang|it|L'Allegro, il Penseroso ed il Moderato:}} As steals the morn upon the night === Second compact disc === # {{lang|it|Arminio: Fatto scorta al sentier della gloria}} # {{lang|it|Arminio: Fiaccherò quel fiero orgoglio}} # {{lang|it|Alcina: Verdi prati}} # {{lang|it|Alcina: Ombre pallide}} # {{lang|it|Rinaldo: Venti, turbini}} # {{lang|it|Rodrigo: Prendi l'alma e prendi il core}} # {{lang|it|Deidamia: Nasconde l'usignol}} # {{lang|it|Deidamia: Nel riposo e nel contento}} # {{lang|it|Deidamia: Della guerra la caccia ha sembianza}} # {{lang|it|Tanti strali al sen}} # {{lang|it|Rodelinda: Se 'l mio duol non è si forte}} # {{lang|it|Caro autor di mia doglia}} # {{lang|it|Giulio Cesare: Son nata a lagrimar}} == References == * [http://www.virginclassics.com/vclass-cgi-bin/new_frm.cgi?&key=788 Information on "Heavenly Handel" on the web site of Virgin Classics] [[Category:2004 compilation albums]]
